recipe.title: Shrimp with Olive Oil, Garlic and Lime
instructions: Preheat oven to 450°F. Combine first 5 ingredients in 13 x 9 x 2-inch glass baking dish; whisk to blend. Mix in shrimp; let stand 20 minutes, stirring occasionally. Bake shrimp until just opaque in center, about 15 minutes. Spoon shrimp and juices into bowls. Serve with lime wedges.
